input_prompt: Please explain what semantic imitation means.

model_outputs.GPT-4o: Semantic imitation refers to the model mimicking language patterns without true understanding.
model_outputs.LLaMA-2-7B: Semantic imitation means producing seemingly reasonable responses lacking causal reasoning.
model_outputs.Gemma-3n: Semantic imitation is the generation of seemingly meaningful statements by surface-level pattern matching.
